Package org.pac4j.core.authorization.generator

Class FromAttributesAuthorizationGenerator<U extends CommonProfile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.authorization.generator.FromAttributesAuthorizationGenerator<U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationGenerator<U>
    public class FromAttributesAuthorizationGenerator<U extends CommonProfile>
extends Object
implements AuthorizationGenerator<U>

    Generate the authorization information by inspecting attributes.

    The attributes containing the roles separated by the splitChar property (can be set through setSplitChar(String)) are defined in the constructor. It's the same for the attributes containing the permissions.

    Since:
    1.5.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
